message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'd be happy to make a deal at that price

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, which is still a great price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,250. Can we make it work at that price?
